user.title: WiiM Device Discovery
user.description: Choose how to add your WiiM device

data_description.discovery_mode: Select 'Automatic' to discover devices on your network, or 'Manual' to enter an IP address

manual.title: Manual Device Setup
manual.description: Enter the IP address of your WiiM device

data_description.host: The IP address of your WiiM device (e.g., 192.168.1.100)

discovery.title: Discovered WiiM Devices
discovery.description: Select a discovered WiiM device from the list below

upnp.title: Select WiiM Speaker
upnp.description: Choose a speaker from the discovered devices, or configure manually.

confirm.title: Confirm Device
confirm.description: Confirm adding this WiiM device to Home Assistant

abort.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the device.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is powered on.
error.no_devices: No WiiM devices found on your network. Try manual setup instead.

data_description.status_update_interval: How often to check the speaker status (1-60 seconds). Lower values provide faster updates but use more resources.
data_description.volume_step_percent: Volume change amount when using volume up/down buttons (1-50%). Smaller steps provide finer control.
data_description.enable_group_entity: Create virtual group controller entities when this device acts as a multiroom master. Allows unified control of speaker groups.
data_description.use_ha_native_grouping: Enable Home Assistant's native media player grouping features. Recommended for consistent UI experience across different speaker brands.
data_description.debug_logging: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Recommended only when experiencing issues.

play_preset.name: Play Preset
play_preset.description: Play a preset station or playlist (buttons 1-6 on speaker).

sync_time.name: Sync Time
sync_time.description: Synchronize speaker clock with Home Assistant time.
